system.description: You are able to make Wobbufet-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 50% of the party's max HP. After making a Wobbufet-class Curry, roll a d100. On a 1-5, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.
